channel.title: Wolt Strike Cyprus
channel.description: Recent content on Wolt Strike Cyprus

item.title: Wolt Strike Cyprus
item.description: To the management team, Wolt Nicosia, We are hereby to notify you that we gathered here today the 13th of December 2022, since there has been the changes with base payment rates from €2.40 within 1 km area to €2.26 cents with an unprofessional way, and we the team of wolt couriers of Nicosia, are really dissatisfied with the payment system. We come up all here together to demand our needs and I hope the management team take this point into consideration.
